name: Adventuring Crash Course
description:
Tired of being a farmer, town guard or hedge wizard? Craving a life of adventure, fame, and vast, vast riches? Worried your skills aren't quite up to snuff yet to make it a reality?

Fret not, because our Adventuring Crash Course will take you from zero to hero in a few short weeks! Learn the basics in our intensive lessons, then apply them right away in our absolutely realistic yet totally safe magical Training Dungeons(TM)(Patent Pending) conjured by our expert archmage lecturers!

Featuring strange creatures to battle, devious traps to evade and fiendish puzzles to solve! ENROLL NOW!

Currently in a prototype state. No decision yet on the skill/character system to be used. Probably will be a roguelike without a deep story and randomly generated areas.

WASD controls movement, mouse looks. Mouse button for firebolt.
